Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to the assessment of property owned by water-works corporations
Summary: Enacts the "Long Island water utility reform act"; relates to the assessment of property owned by water-works corporations; establishes the Nassau county water authority.
LawCode: Add Art 5 Title 4-A §§1092-a - 1092-v, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to the assessment of property owned by water-works corporations; and to amend the public authorities law, in relation to creating the Nassau county water authority
